name: ProjectBoost
description:
Made following the Ben Tristam and the Gamedev.tv Team's course on unity 3D development on udemy

GameDev.tv game course

check them out nice community full of helpful people who knows you might even learn something ;)

Controls
Space - Thrust
** new** R - Restart Level
A&D - Rotate Rocket
Esc - Quit Game

Enjoy more levels will come if i feel like making them =)
